backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for The Jurists backend defining data types (Jurisdiction, LeadStatus, PracticeArea, etc.), contact form submission storage, and access control initialization for an ICP-based legal services app.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two completed features—email address replacement and visual theme revert—to their affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing the purpose and recent changes of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point that mounts the React app and includes Google Tag Manager and AMP Analytics script tags.
frontend/public/google2b25be66b928ef08.h: Google Search Console site verification file for thejurists.in.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers full site access and pointing to the sitemap at https://thejurists.in/sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static XML sitemap listing all public pages of thejurists.in including home, services, blog, contact, and jurisdiction pages with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining all application routes (services, blog, jurisdictions, admin, etc.) and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/Breadcrumbs.tsx: Breadcrumb navigation component that renders a linked trail with chevron separators and injects a JSON-LD BreadcrumbList structured data schema.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component that embeds a Google Forms iframe (defaulting to a specific form URL) inside a styled Card with luxury theme styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class component that catches rendering errors and displays a styled error UI with options to retry or navigate home, supporting an optional custom fallback.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders an accordion-based FAQ section with a title, injecting FAQ structured data (JSON-LD) into the page via the StructuredData component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying brand info, quick links, practice area links, and jurisdiction links for The Jurists law firm.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with desktop dropdowns for Services and Jurisdictions and a responsive mobile menu for The Jurists site.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps page content with the shared Header and Footer, rendering child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves the profile using the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Imperatively updates document title, meta description, canonical link, Open Graph, and Twitter Card tags via useEffect for SEO purposes.
frontend/src/components/StructuredData.t: Injects JSON-LD structured data scripts into the document head and exports helper functions for generating LocalBusiness, Organization, LegalService, and FAQ schemas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, contact form submissions, admin checks, and blog articles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a navy/gold luxury color palette with CSS custom properties for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page for The Jurists law firm displaying team members, firm values, and story sections with SEO metadata and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Empty admin dashboard page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog article fetched by ID with SEO head, structured data, breadcrumbs, and formatted metadata like date and practice area category.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog articles in a card grid with SEO metadata, breadcrumbs, loading/empty states, and navigation to individual article detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with a hero section, contact info cards (location, email, hours), a contact form, and an embedded map, including SEO metadata and structured data.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleVerificationPag: Empty file, likely a placeholder for a Google site verification page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with a hero section, practice areas grid, 'Why Choose Us' highlights, and SEO/structured data for The Jurists law firm in Hyderabad.
frontend/src/pages/InitializeAdminPage.t: One-time admin setup page that authenticates via Internet Identity and calls an initialization mutation to grant the caller admin access, then redirects to the leads dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/JurisdictionPage.tsx: Reusable page component that renders location-specific legal service content for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, Rangareddy, or Cyberabad, driven by a jurisdiction prop and a static data map.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Admin-only dashboard that lists contact form submissions with filtering by jurisdiction and status, supports status updates, and guards access via Internet Identity and admin role checks.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed page for each legal service (family law, corporate law, etc.) using route params, displaying description, features list, and SEO metadata with structured data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all 11 legal services offered by The Jurists with icons, descriptions, gradient styling, and links to individual service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, serif/sans font families, luxury box shadows, border radii, and accordion/fade-in animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording completed features (email update, theme revert to 42nd draft) and architectural notes like phone/login button removal.
